org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.nfq.util

Class PolicyEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.nfq.util.PolicyEvaluator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, AgentObserver

    public class PolicyEvaluator
extends Object
implements AgentObserver, Serializable
    This class evaluates a policy after every "N" episodes for "M" randomly drawn start positions.
    Author:
    tokicm
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • PolicyEvaluator

        public PolicyEvaluator(Policy pi,
                       Environment env,
                       Experiment experiment,
                       int testEpisode,
                       int randStartPositions,
                       int maxSteps,
                       State initState)
        The constructor.
        Parameters:
        pi - The policy to be evaluated
        env - The environment to be evaluated
        experiment - The external experiment to stop when stop-criterion is achieved
        testEpisode - After every testEpisodes episodes, the learned Q-function is evaluated
        randStartPositions - The amount of random start positions to be evaluated
        maxSteps - The maximum number of steps per episode
        initState - The initial state

        Description copied from interface: AgentObserver
        This method will be called in every step of the experiment
        Specified by:
        update in interface AgentObserver
        Parameters:
        state - State at time t
        action - Action at time t
        arg2 - State at time t+1
        arg3 - Action at time t+1
        arg4 - Reward for doing action a in state s
        arg5 - True if sn is a terminal state

      • terminateOnGoalStateRate

        public void terminateOnGoalStateRate(PolicyEvaluator.STOP_CRITERION stopCriterion,
                                     double terminationGoalStateRate)
        This function configures termination of the learning process if a desired goal state rate is achieved.
        Parameters:
        stopCriterion - The desired termination criterion
        terminationGoalStateRate - Desired goal state (0 < goalStateRate < 1) rate for terminating the NFQ usecase.
